title: Driver Admin Manager Job at White Soul Group
content:
White Soul Group is a leading provider of logistics solutions and vehicle sales and after-sales services, dedicated to delivering excellence in every aspect of our business. With a commitment to innovation, integrity, and customer satisfaction, we strive to exceed expectations and become your trusted partner in logistics and automobile needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Driver Admin Manager 

Job Location: Lagos

Duties and Responsibilities 
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Ensure update of Software with new Customer & Vendors information;
	Set up and maintain depot fixed assets register, comply with laid down process and procedures and maintain a proper fixed asset register for the entire terminal.
	Prepare and maintain stock Bin card/sheet of all inventories Items.
	Maintain Access with Sage ERP on Inventories matters
	Prepare Store Goods Receive Note.
	Take stock of inventory and fixed assets with monthly reports
	Conduct Stock reconciliations report
	Daily Stock inventory report very key.
	Maintain Stock re-order level
	Receive and Issue out of Inventories. • Prepare Stock count schedule sheet
	Take Period stock Count and reconciliations with the sage figures and Value
	Ensure agreement between Bin card figure and sage Figure
	Liase with the workshop manager on stock issues.
	Carry out other assignments as may be required from time to time by Head of Finance Purchase & Inventory Report
	Make requisition for Purchase of item that is on stock out or near to stock out.
	Preparation of timely stock level Report
	Ensure that all details of every item; Date, Quantity, Price and other relevant details are captured in the Report 
	The purchasing officers' details must be clearly stated in the Report
	Exception Report on all Store items
	Ensuring that the details of each store items issued out are properly signed for and accounted for
	Carry out routine checks on the store
	Reconciliation of item balances with the Store/Warehouse keeper
	Production of Consumption Report to determine the amount chargeable to Cost of Sales
	Verification that the approved items are the exact items delivered by the vendors
	Routine stock taking to ascertain the items in the warehouse and store


Salary
N350,000 - N500,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@whitesoulgroup.org using the Job Position and location as the subject of the email (E.g Fleet Officer-Lagos).

Note: Only qualified applicants should apply.

title: Technical Storekeeper Job at Perfetti Van Melle Nigeria Limited
content:
Perfetti Van Melle Nigeria Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of Perfetti Van Melle group, one of the worlds largest manufacturers and distributors of confectionery and chewing gum, creating imaginative products and brands that are enjoyed in over 150 countries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technical Storekeeper

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Carry out stock and inventory control by reordering spare parts using set reorder levels and Economic Order Quantities as Set up in Maximo
	Constantly review ROL and EOQ to minimize stockouts and ensure availability of needed spare parts for effective operations.
	Ensure implementation of 5S principles within the technical store.
	Act as process owner from purchase-to-pay process for all technical items and services.
	Participate in and oversee monthly stock taking exercise.


Requirements


	Holds Higher National Diploma or Bachelor's degree in Engineering related studies.
	Proven work experience of minimum five (5) years in similar position.
	Excellent MS Excel skills.
	Excellent knowledge of SAP
	Ability to prioritize effectively.
	Goal-oriented with proven ability to get results.
	Good negotiation skills.
